materials.raw_text: - O: 1920 g (calculated from molar mass and stoichiometry)

sourcing.instructions: - O (Oxygen): Obtain from liquid oxygen suppliers or chemical supply companies.
steps: - O (Oxygen): Obtain from liquid oxygen suppliers or chemical supply companies.
1. Measure out 1920 g of Oxygen gas and store in a suitable gas cylinder.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 1920 g of Oxygen gas and store in a suitable gas cylinder.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally.

steps: 1. Carefully remove the crucible from the furnace once cooled.
